title: Picture of you
lyrics:
[intro, kazoo] 
(C) (Em) (Gm) (F) x2
 
(C) Didn't they say that I would (Em)make a mistake
(Gm) Didn't they say you were gon(F)na be trouble
(C) People told me you were (Em)too much to take
I could (Gm)see it, I didn't (F)wanna know
(C) I let you in and you (Em) let me down
(Gm) You pushed me up and (F)turned my life around
(C) I could feel that I had (Em)nowhere to go
I was alo-(Gm)one, how was I (Dm) to know that 
 
[bridge]
(Am)You'll be there, when I (Em)needed some(G)body
(Am)You'll be there, the (F)only one to (G)help me
 
[chorus]
(C)I-I-I had a (Em)picture of you in my (Bb)mind
Never (F)knew it could be so (C)wrong
Why'd it (Em)take me so long just to (Bb)find
Just a (F)friend that was (G)there all along
(C) (Em) (Gm) (F)
 
(C) Who'd believe that after (Em)all we've been through
(Gm) I'd be able to (F)put my trust in you
(C) Goes to show you can't for(Em)give and forget
Looking ba-(Gm)ack, I (Dm)have no re(G)grets cause
 
[bridge]
(Am)You'll be there, when I (Em)needed some(G)body
(Am)You'll be there, the (F)only one to (G)help me-e-e-e-e
 
[chorus]
(C)I-I had a (Em)picture of you in my (Bb)mind
Never (F)knew it could be so (C)wrong
Why'd it (Em)take me so long just to (Bb)find
Just a (F)friend that was (G)there all along
 
[chorus again!]
(C) Had a (Em)picture of you in my (Bb)mind
Never (F)knew it could be so (C)wrong
Why'd it (Em)take me so long just to (Bb)find
Just a (F)friend that was (G)there all along
(C) (Em) (Gm) (F) x2
(C) [end]
